definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Three yellow, cylindrical, two-storey volumes within this space house science laboratories.
sentences.chinese: 三個淺黃色的圓柱形三層體量，包含科學實驗室。

sentences.english: The small-sized blockhouse architectures show good earthquake-proofing capacity as well.
sentences.chinese: 小體量碉房建築也在客觀上產生了較好的抗震作用。

sentences.english: So, under the light, the sculptured white volume reveals its cut.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在光線下，白色的雕塑體量顯示出它的切口。

sentences.english: This volume is again bathed with light through a circle and a slit.
sentences.chinese: 這個體量也是通過圓與狹縫進行光的沐浴。

sentences.english: The second volume contains the master bedroom suite and a downstairs office.
sentences.chinese: 第二個體量包括主臥室臺套間和樓下的辦公區。

sentences.english: Each floor has its own dynamic shape, the square volumes overhanging one another.
sentences.chinese: 每層樓都有其動態形狀，體量相互搭接着。

sentences.english: A design with efficient office floor plates and a rational box were requested by the client.
sentences.chinese: 高效的辦公平面佈置和合理的體量是客戶所要求的。

sentences.english: Two arms leading outwards from the atrium are lined with 38 classrooms.
sentences.chinese: 從中庭向外伸展出兩個體量，其中有38間教室。

sentences.english: Inside the atrium there are three yellow drums raised above the floor on circular columns.
sentences.chinese: 在中庭內部從地面升起三個黃色鼓形的體量。

sentences.english: A portion of the volume sits atop a stone-clad box.
sentences.chinese: 部分建築體量坐落在一個石頭覆層基座的頂部。

sentences.english: Italy is so much bigger that it is a qualitatively different problem.
sentences.chinese: 體量大得多的意大利則是完全不同的另外一個問題。

sentences.english: The programme called for the conservation of the volumes through the creation of central patios.
sentences.chinese: 項目要求通過創建中央天井來保護體量。

sentences.english: A composition of three monolithic volumes, the design introvertly opens up to an elevated outdoor terrace.
sentences.chinese: 住宅由三個體量組成，設計向着高擡的室外露臺打開。

definition: can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
